forgetting.factor.page.title: This is the value that shows the speed of your forgetting
forgetting.factor.page.title.description: For example. You added a card and start learning session from this card set. At the moment when the card was show you you click I KNOW. It means that next time this card will show you after days (from this input) * number of I KNOW clicks.
